Articles.Content:
I would really enjoy sending a probe to each planet and moon to take survey photos of the surface. It would be great if you could pull up these images by probe at the Space Center, but heck -- I would settle for a mod that tosses the photos into the screenshot directory.

Thoughts?
There's a mod for that called "The Ordan Industries Telescope"

There's a mod for that called "The Ordan Industries Telescope"

Isn't that more of a space telescope than a remote imagery camera to attach to probes?

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/24639-0-19-1-54-Ordan-Industries-Telescope!-Last-Updated-Apr-18-2013!

Do you know if this includes a camera part I can add to existing probes or does it require the entire craft? I'm working off mobile so I can't download and test it out. A Space Telescope would be fun but I'd also like to just have a camera part I could add to probes.

There's a mod for that called "The Ordan Industries Telescope"

This appears to be a space telescope. Very cool, but I was hoping for a camera that you can place as equipment on probes and send through the solar system to take shots of the planets from orbit, on the surface, etc. Does anything like that exist out there?
